standing_stones.name: The Warrior Stone
standing_stones.location: South of Riverwood, near Lake Ilinalta

effect.game_mechanic: Once per session, gain +2 to Fight, Shoot, or Athletics in combat
effect.narrative: Blessed by the Warrior, combat prowess enhanced

standing_stones.lore: The Warrior is one of the three Guardian Stones. Those under its sign are skilled in combat.

standing_stones.name: The Mage Stone
standing_stones.location: South of Riverwood, near Lake Ilinalta

effect.game_mechanic: Once per session, gain +2 to Lore for magic or spellcasting
effect.narrative: Blessed by the Mage, magical power enhanced

standing_stones.lore: The Mage is one of the three Guardian Stones. Those under its sign are skilled in magic.

standing_stones.name: The Thief Stone
standing_stones.location: South of Riverwood, near Lake Ilinalta

effect.game_mechanic: Once per session, gain +2 to Stealth, Deceive, or Notice
effect.narrative: Blessed by the Thief, stealth and cunning enhanced

standing_stones.lore: The Thief is one of the three Guardian Stones. Those under its sign are skilled in stealth.

standing_stones.name: The Ritual Stone
standing_stones.location: East of Whiterun, northeast of Graywinter Watch

effect.game_mechanic: Once per session, reanimate dead within zone to fight for you for one scene

standing_stones.lore: Those born under the sign of the Ritual have a variety of abilities depending on the aspects of the moons and the Divines.

standing_stones.name: The Serpent Stone
standing_stones.location: Northwest of Winterhold, on an island

effect.game_mechanic: Once per session, paralyze an enemy for one round (no defense roll)
effect.narrative: Strike like a serpent, immobilizing foes

standing_stones.lore: Those born under the Serpent are the most blessed and the most cursed.

standing_stones.name: The Shadow Stone
standing_stones.location: South of Riften, near the volcanic tundra

effect.game_mechanic: Once per session, become invisible for 60 seconds (one scene)

standing_stones.lore: The Shadow grants those under its sign the ability to blend into darkness.

standing_stones.name: The Steed Stone
standing_stones.location: Northwest of Solitude, in the mountains

effect.game_mechanic: +1 to Athletics, ignore armor penalties to Stealth
effect.narrative: Swift as a horse, unburdened by armor

standing_stones.lore: Those born under the sign of the Steed can move quickly and are not hindered by armor.

standing_stones.name: The Lord Stone
standing_stones.location: East of Morthal, in the mountains

effect.game_mechanic: +1 to Defend against physical attacks, +1 to Will against magic

standing_stones.lore: Those born under the sign of the Lord are stronger and more resistant to harm.

standing_stones.name: The Lady Stone
standing_stones.location: West of Whiterun, near the Guardian Stones

effect.game_mechanic: Recover 1 additional physical stress box per scene

standing_stones.lore: Those born under the sign of the Lady regenerate health and stamina more quickly.

standing_stones.name: The Lover Stone
standing_stones.location: East of Markarth, near Kolskeggr Mine
standing_stones.lore: Those born under the sign of the Lover are more proficient in all skills.

standing_stones.name: The Atronach Stone
standing_stones.location: South of Windhelm, near Cragslane Cavern

effect.game_mechanic: +2 to Lore for spellcasting, but magicka doesn't regenerate naturally (must absorb spells or use potions)
effect.narrative: Immense magical power with a cost

standing_stones.lore: Those born under the sign of the Atronach cannot regenerate magicka naturally but can absorb spells.

standing_stones.name: The Tower Stone
standing_stones.location: Between Winterhold and Dawnstar, on the northern coast

effect.game_mechanic: Once per session, automatically open an Average difficulty lock

standing_stones.lore: Those born under the Tower have a knack for finding gold and opening locks.

standing_stones.name: The Apprentice Stone
standing_stones.location: North of Solitude, near the coast

effect.game_mechanic: Magicka regenerates twice as fast, but take +1 stress from magical attacks
effect.narrative: Raw magical talent, vulnerable to magic

standing_stones.lore: Those born under the Apprentice have increased magicka but are more vulnerable to magic.

changing_stones.rule: Players can change their Standing Stone blessing by visiting a different stone in-game
changing_stones.consequence: Only one Standing Stone blessing can be active at a time
changing_stones.narrative: Your character must physically travel to the stone and meditate/activate it

game_mechanics.discovery: Some stones are well-known (Guardian Stones), others require exploration to find
